name: Julian Morales
coverLetter: Hey trim work my names Julian I Been trimming for about 4 years, I can trim about a half pound of outdoor every 3 hours im not the type to act cocky or say I know it all but I'm not a rookie either,also always willing to learn your trim methods to be able to trim your plants to your liking, I like to connect with other people that are also into hydroponics, i like to grow and trim my own plants when i get the chance but I'm really interested in joining the team if your willing to give me the opportunity contact me asap
